title: Bachelorette star Jackson Garlick strips down to speedos and flirts with girls in Mexico
text:
He's vying to win Angie Kent's heart on The Bachelorette.

But on Monday, Jackson Garlick proved he's got plenty to offer when he stripped down to a pair of skimpy speedos while in Cabo, Mexico.

The sales manager, 25, looked every inch the single lad on tour as he soaked up the sun at the stunning beachside location.

The whole package! Bachelorette star Jackson Garlick, 25, (pictured) stripped down to a pair of skimpy speedos as he flirted up a storm with a bevy of beauties in Mexico on Monday

Jackson flaunted his muscular chest and bulging biceps in the small swimwear, as he ran back-and-forth for a dip in the ocean.

It didn't take long, however, for him to be joined by a group of ladies in the ocean.

The sighting is believed to confirm he doesn't win Angie's heart on the series.

Jackson appeared to share a casual flirt with a mystery bikini-clad beach-goer, with the pair sharing a laugh as they waded into the ocean.

Flirty! The hunky TV star appeared to confirm he doesn't win Angie's heart as he flirted with a number of fellow holidaymakers while in Cabo

Jackson proved himself popular while in the tropical waters, as he was also approached by two other women.

The TV star smiled broadly during the swim, and was only too happy to show off his pumped-up chest while spending time with the ladies.

At one point Jackson looked every inch the prince charming as he put his arm around two of the women while splashing in the warm ocean waters.

Hey ladies! Jackson appeared to cosy up with a mystery woman while going for a dip

Fun in the sun! Jackson enjoyed some light-hearted banter with the ladies

Sun soaked! Jackson appeared only too happy to enjoy the company of the ladies while enjoying an ocean dip

Feeling hot, hot, hot! Jackson showed off his own fit physique during his dip in the water

Cheeky! Jackson and one of the women appeared to enjoy a laugh together while wading into the water

Jackson appeared happy to be holding court with the ladies, as he laughed and joked in the shallows of the ocean before heading back to the beach.

Elsewhere, the handsome reality star competed in a push-up competition alongside his former NRL star dad Sean, but he unfortunately didn't win.

Jackson had his athletic prowess on full display as he did a number of dips while holding his body weight up with the assistance of a plastic white garden chair.

Competitive: Jackson (pictured) showed off his muscular frame while on the stage

Over and out! Jackson appeared strong at the beginning only to topple on his head

Oh no! Jackson appeared to fall during his push-up on stage

Posers! Jackson and the other men in the push up competition took to the stage and posed together, showing off their fit physiques

The hunky Channel 10 star unfortunately fell from the garden seating and was disqualified from the competition.

He did, however, prove himself to be a good sport by posing with the other buff men - including his dad Sean - who also competed in the competition.

Despite being the youngest suitor on The Bachelorette, Jackson has already proved to be one of the favourites to win Angie's heart.

Swapping numbers! Jackson was later seen on the beach appearing to swap numbers with a number of the ladies he was swimming with in the water

Earlier this month, she chose him for a single date and the pair took to the skies in a helicopter.

But things didn't go to plan when Angie, 29, began suffering from motion sickness.

'You can spew in my top pocket if you want,' he said, with Angie telling him, 'That would be the worst thing ever!'

Not meant to be! Despite being the youngest suitor on The Bachelorette, Jackson has already proved to be one of the favourites to win Angie's heart

Despite Angie saying the date was a 'disaster', Jackson assured her it was okay and he was eventually rewarded with a rose.

Last week, Daily Mail Australia published exclusive pictures showing Jackson makes it to Angie's final four, alongside Timm Hanley, Carlin Sterritt and Ryan Anderson.

The Bachelorette continues Wednesday at 7:30pm on Channel 10.
description: He's vying to win Angie Kent's heart on The Bachelorette.
authors: Caleb Taylor For Daily Mail Australia
